example.eg: Doctors have to know all the different bones in the human skeleton.
example.egtrans: 医生需要了解人类骨骼中的所有骨头。

example.eg: The anorexic had starved herself so much, she was just a skeleton.
example.egtrans: 那个患了厌食症的女孩节食过度，成了个皮包骨头的人。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 皮包骨头的人, 骨瘦如柴的人

example.eg: The skeleton was in place, now the builders had to finish the building.
example.egtrans: 大楼的框架已经架好，现在建筑工人们需要完成大楼的建设。

example.eg: The leaf had broken down, leaving just its skeleton behind.
example.egtrans: 树叶腐烂了，只剩下叶脉。

example.eg: Over the holiday period, there was only a skeleton staff manning the hospital.
example.egtrans: 节日期间，医院只有必需的工作人员值班。

example.eg: Wendy submitted the skeleton of her new novel to her publisher for feedback.

dsense.name: skeleton in the closet, also UK: skeleton in the cupboard

example.eg: Everyone has a few skeletons in their cupboard that they wouldn't like other people to find out about.
The hotel maid had a skeleton key so she could let herself into any room she wanted.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 骨瘦如柴的，消瘦的，瘦骨嶙峋的
